Plugins:¶

Two kinds of plugins are available:

Open-source plugins:¶

Those plugins are freely available and can be access directly from TOTO

Statistics¶

  • Common statistics

  • Comparison statistics

  • Directionnal statistics

Plots¶

  • Roses

  • BIAS histogram

  • Density diagram

  • Thermocline plot

Tide¶

  • De-tiding

  • Re-construct

  • Predict

  • Tidal statistics

  • Skew surge

Transformations¶

  • Rotation

  • Wind profile

  • Depth-average / layers

  • Hs sea

  • Orbital velocity

  • U & V / Spd & drr

Wave¶

  • Wave spectra

  • Wavelet analysis

Extreme value analysis¶

  • Shape distribution

Close-source plugins:¶

Those plugins can be access after being granted permission by:

  • Brett Beamsley: b.beamsley@metocean.co.nz

  • Remy Zyngfogel: r.zyngfogel@calypso.science

Statistics¶

  • Joint probability

  • Weather window

  • Exceedence probability

  • Exceedence coincidence probability

  • Workability

  • Wave population

  • Modal wave period

  • Weighted direction
